Cincinnati.Cut-in-the-Hill: Cut-in-the-Hill is a 1.3-mile (2.1 km) stretch of highway in Covington, Kentucky signed as part of both Interstate 71 and Interstate 75. It is a steep descent into the valley of the Ohio River between Kyles Lane and the Brent Spence Bridge near Cincinnati, Ohio. The hill is known for its high number of automobile accidents.
